description: opened the app, can press the keys but no sounds being made

If it could make sound it would have been nice, simple. Seems the coding project was just abandoned...  "Hate it" is not really the case ...It is fine enough, but no sound to a keyboard app sinks it immediately... dunno how to fix it myself.. THAT is rather hateful!
Doesn't make any sound by default. I had to play around with sound server to make it work.
It looks like a really comprehensive tool, loads of instruments, but simply doesn't do what it says on the tin. Would love to know how to get it working, so perhaps a how-to somewhere please?

Everyone is saying that this doesn't play any sound. Yeah, it's not supposed to. It just sends MIDI data to the JACK audio server so that you can control other virtual instruments. You need to download a JACK connection tool like QJackCtl and some virtual instruments like ZynAddSubFX or amsynth and then you can play sound with it. As a Virtual MIDI Controller, it's pretty simple, but it works great!
summary: Works Great, People Just Don't Know What This Tool Is For
